entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Oromocto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:12 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 18 except minus 24 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18 except minus 24 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
